name: Test
body:
### 欢迎来到我的Github

#### 本文引导你配置vim及bash配色


```
操作以下命令:
1. 先安装git
2. git clone https://github.com/qq53/test.git
3. cd test
4. ./init
5. 根据提示修改bashrc文件
```

![](http://new.xiyoulinux.org/img/laptop.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
